title: Post Job to Career Site and Job Boards
description: A new job requisition has been approved and needs to be posted externally.

tasks.description: Identify the approved job requisition in the ATS.
Post the job to the company's external career site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter successfully posts the job to the career site.

tasks.description: Post the job to external job boards like LinkedIn and Indeed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter uses the ATS integration to post the job to multiple external boards.
